  1. 2. Development
  2. Storing Data

Storage

As in every app, you might want to persist some information on your smart contract. For this, the NEAR SDK implements a variety of structures that can readily simplify your life.

Explain each type, explain they can support objects as well as simple types

Storage

In AS we will need to explain storage.set(), storage.get() and storage.getSome()

Assemblyscript 
logging.log("Example in typescript")
Rust 
println!("Example in RUST")
